headline: Assessing ConocoPhillips (COP) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Mixed Analyst Signals
summary: Why ConocoPhillips (COP) Is On Investors’ Radar Today ConocoPhillips (COP) is back in focus after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at $110.52 and posting mixed short term returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for ConocoPhillips. That 1 day share price gain comes after a strong run, with a 30 day share price return of 12.56% and a 90 day gain of 26.35%, alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 14.80%.
